DOC.brief_summary: IPM 018 double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study conduct one site Belgium among 24 healthy , HIV-negative woman evaluate dapivirine release 28 day matrix reservoir intravaginal ring , contain 25 mg dapivirine , assess safety tolerability compare placebo
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Dapivirine Vaginal Rings Belgium
DOC.criteria: Women 18 35 year age Willing able give write informed consent Available visit consent follow procedure schedule study Healthy HIVnegative determine HIV1 ELISA test time enrollment ; Willing abstain sexual activity duration study Willing use oral contraceptive avoid menstruation take part study longacting progestin 6 month prior enrollment Upon pelvic / speculum examination enrollment , cervix vagina appear normal Willing refrain use vaginal product object duration study . History alcoholism , drug abuse , psychosis , antagonistic personality , poor motivation , emotional intellectual problem likely invalidate inform consent process adversely impact compliance protocol requirement ; History sensitivity / allergy latex , dapivirine constituent vaginal ring ( i.e . silicone elastomer ) Currently pregnant breastfeeding , within three month last pregnancy outcome Currently within one month participate clinical research study History diagnosis / treatment sexually transmit disease within last three month History genital tract surgery within last month Current diagnosis sexually transmit infection ( Gonorrhea , Chlamydia Trichomonas ) Current vulvar vaginal symptom / abnormality could influence study result History significant urogenital uterine prolapse , undiagnosed vaginal bleeding urethral obstruction within last three month ; Smoking 10 cigarette per day
